header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends

body.u: that's the words

we have the exact same relationship with like very very similar personalities which is weird cos we don't have the same dad but whatever erm basically one thing that I've never been able to get over is the way that my mum would always call tea tea or dinner it's like what do you want for dinner? what do you want for tea? the more and more time she spent at 's bearing in mind we'd already moved from England to France

so I dunno she would like see her what like every maybe like three times a year two times a year sometimes one times a year one time sorry all of a sudden from one day to the next after being at the 's she would start calling it supper because called it supper because grew up she'd never called it tea or dinner in her life she's always called it supper because her parents called it supper like it was just supper

I'm sorry like I don't have time to make them some of my problem like before even asking me like I hadn't even gotten back to France at that point when they had the booking for these people coming in saying yeah we are gonna like put us kids in school for a year and see how it goes in France and like naming the schools and stuff before I even knew that there was going to be that long term tenant before they even aske my mum even asked me if I was okay with it she sent a message to tthis woman like saying yeah will be help h will be happy to come over every night and give tutoring she'll give so much advice cos she's lived through all of this kind of stuff and I was just like no I'm sorry like not to sound selfish but when I moved over there there was no one there
to help you
to tell me how to do it I was like you're a fucking child like at that age you don't give a shit

and I'd always wanted to go and we hadn't been all summer she got back and she was asking me what I was up to and I said yeah yesterday we went to the space show and she was like oh no you should have waited for me to come I would have loved to come with you guys we could have like done it on like a family day out and that kind of stuff like and I was just like no actually it was like a date day and like yeah it might have been sad but yeah me and my boyfriend enjoy doing that kind of stuff ourselves I was like yeah we've been to the the medieval castle a few times like had meals out and all of that k and she was acting as if it like physically offended her that I have a life when she's not there like doing stuff just with my boyfriend as a couple and I'm just like sorry do you want an invitation while we go upstairs and have sex as well like do you want to be there for that or
well she leaves notes so
well it just does my fucking head in and then

right like whatever I don't care okay but she got back on the Sunday and I left Tuesday morning she got back Sunday afternoon we had Monday together that Monday I specifically said to people don't come over I'm having my last family day at home me and were just like watching having like a Harry Potter marathon doing puzzles cos you know I'm sad
mm

erm at home and she was popping in and out seeing other people running errands and literally she was like erm yeah I'm going to go to and buy a washing machine erm do you wanna come with me and I was like I literally can't think of anything that I would
that would like not like to do
yeah I was like I can't think of anything worse to do with my last day

in France bearing in mind it's my last day of the whole summer at home it's like I can't think of anything worse to do and she was like oh I was kind of hoping that we could have like mother daughter time and I was like hang on huh I woke up specifically at eight o'clock in the morning to have the whole day with her so that we could have like a whole day doing stuff all together have a meal in the evening go to bed whatever and she fucking pissed off at nine o'clock in the morning and had been out doing stuff and I was just like well you could have postponed that to the Tuesday the next day
yeah one day isn't gonna hurt

and then she complained to me when I was like and it got to eleven o'clock at night and I had to be up at fucking what like six o'clock in the morning to get my flight and I was tired anyway and wanted a bit of alone time with our last night together and stuff and she was like oh I ju I feel like I haven't seen you like all day and we haven't like seen each other for like three weeks and I'm not seeing you for ages and I was like mum I turned down plans to go and do stuff on this last day like I had plans from other people who wanted to see me purposely to be at home so I could be with you and you've fucked off all day and when I said that to her instantly she was just like she uhu uhu and I was like yeah whatever and walked off and she came and found me like started crying and whatever and then instantly I felt bad because she always plays the guilt card and I was just like what do you want from me? I was literally just like well you're the one that decided to go to England for three weeks you could have gone for a week and I understand that is your other daughter and you're important but you can't go away for three weeks and come back two days before I leave and then make me feel guilty about the fact that I have to go back to England to get on with my life
yeah yeah
it's like
she didn't need to go for three weeks though
no she didn't
she didn't need to go for three weeks
that's the thing what pissed me off the most because I'm not jealous that my mum spends time with my other sisters
no of course you're not
good luck to my other sisters to be completely honest but to come back and make me feel guilty as if I was the one that was doing all of that I was just like
she didn't she did not need to be in England for the amount of time she was

and she did not need to go when she did
she's fucking going back in November

my mum doesn't understand it that that year that she pissed off for three months to New Zealand how much do you think that fucking cost? and then because we didn't realise she was coming back for Christmas day obviously my dad hadn't made any plans and I spent Christmas day at my parents' friend's house who are in their fucking seventies I got dragged along from nine o'clock in the morning until god knows how late at night literally just sitting there like I would literally rather be in bed by myself all day Christmas day than be here with these lot I was like fucking how selfish can you get
why did she fuck off for so long?
